alert.note: Alert for Edgefield; Lexington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 26 at 9:46AM EDT until March 26 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central South Carolina, including the following areas, Aiken, Edgefield and Lexington. * WHEN...Until 100 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 946 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Aiken, North Augusta, Aiken Mall, Clearwater, Belvedere, Aiken Municipal Airport, Citizens Park, USC Aiken, Graniteville, Edgefield County Airport, Gloverville, Burnettown, Wagener, Perry, Trenton, Hopeland Gardens, Vaucluse, New Holland and Steedman. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 21 and 23. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 5 and 39. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
